FuncDef: This command creates a buffer allocation mapping between the associatedmid-poolmid-pool-idand the specifiedparent-root-poolroot-pool-id. The specified root pool ID must have a non-zero allocation-weight or the command fails. After a mid-pool is successfully associated with a root-pool, the parent root-pool sallocation-weightvalue cannot be set to zero.

ParaDef.Info: Defines the parent root pool to which the mid-pool is associated. This parameter is required when executing the parent-root-pool command. Values-1 to 16, none.
